betsy.memory

Class ScoredQuestionMemory

  • java.lang.Object
    • betsy.memory.ScoredQuestionMemory
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    QuestionMemory

    public class ScoredQuestionMemory
extends java.lang.Object
implements QuestionMemory
    An implementation of QuestionMemory. Compares the search phrase to statements in memory, and assigns each a score recursively based on how closely they match each other. The highest score wins, unless that score is 0, in which case nobody wins.
    Author:
    jacob

      • filterQuestion

        public WordTree<StructureTag> filterQuestion(WordTree<StructureTag> question)
        Description copied from interface: QuestionMemory
        Get the phrase most likely to answer the question. A full statement is not returned, only a phrase to fill in the missing info in the question.
        Specified by:
        filterQuestion in interface QuestionMemory
        Parameters:
        question - The question phrase
        Returns:
        the most likely answer to the question, or null

        Get a statement most related to the provided one
        Specified by:

        Parameters:

        Returns:
